turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order for pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three pizzas, small.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the first one I want a sausage on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For the second, I would like mushrooms and green peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And for the third, I would like a barbecue chicken pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 small pizzas, one with sausage, one with mushrooms and green peppers, and the third is bbq chicken right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Any add ons or extras?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could I please have gluten-free crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright after adding the gluten free crust your total is $36.05 okay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. It'll be ready in 30m and you'll get the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, have a good day.
